summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated October 9, 2019, transmitting a draft presentation titled 'Barr Presentation Draft' for review. The email suggests the team is working late and intends to provide a verbal briefing with additional points.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Sender of the email transmitting a draft presentation related to the Epstein case, working in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Draft Presentation Submission
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails a draft presentation titled 'Barr Presentation Draft' to an unspecified recipient, indicating ongoing work on the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated October 9, 2019, from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email transmits a draft presentation titled 'Barr Presentation Draft', suggesting it is intended for or related to Attorney General William Barr.
The sender indicates the team is working late ('in case we don't surface from GEP the rest of the night'), implying intensive preparation.
The presentation is described as a 'working draft' with the intent to 'verbally hit more points', indicating it is part of a briefing process.
The document reference 'EFTA00099788' suggests it is part of the Epstein case file records.
